attributes.action: If Liverpool FC finish in the bottom half this season (2011/12) then Kenny Dalglish should be Knighted.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned beseech the Minister for Culture, Media and Sport to recommend that the Prime Minister nominate Kenneth Mathieson 'Kenny' Dalglish for a Knighthood on the proviso that Liverpool FC finish in the bottom half (11th or below) in the 2011-12 English Premier League.
